title: Cannot duo S8 after getting banned in s7
body: I got a 14 day ban  in season 7 and finished the season plat 4.Preaseason reached plat 3.After the soft reset (i got no rewards)i cannot duo queue with any of my plat/gold friends and i am shown as unranked.What is going on? anyone knows?

replies.body: You'll need to work your way back up to gold to duo with plat friends.
But i was plat,did i lose my mmr or smth ?thank u for your time btw.
You lost your previous season rating. So you will have to get your current season rating to within the appropriate range.

Do you actually lose your MMR for getting banned? Thats would seem quite problematic considering the people who are really getting punished more are the lower ELO players that have to play against them

Theres rank decay in plat I think. Its not that you lose MMR for being banned specifically but I think just by virtue of not playing you might drop but I could be wrong. Im prttty sure decay doesnt drop you from plat, it just puts you plat 5 0LP but I could be wrong
Your rank will decay but your MMR will not
I see.I get it now.Thank u for your time again.
Did you even do your placements?
No not yet.But i should be able to duo with a plat player since i was plat right ?

> [{quoted}](name=Kaze no Yaiba,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ur2l2Zot,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-01-19T01:10:51.222+0000)
>
> No not yet.But i should be able to duo with a plat player since i was plat right ?

Honestly, yeah I thought you would be able to but that has to be why. Because right now, youre technically unranked.
yeah i get it now thanks for the help.
Sounds like spaghetti code, but to take your rewards away they drop you under gold. get your MMR to plat and off you go with your buddies.
Have you finished your 10 placement games yet?  You need to finish new placements every season.
